column5: Has anyone out there ever used Mattice Lake Outfitters near Armstrong? If so please pass along your experience.

We used Mattice the third week of July, 2001. We flew into Mojikit Lake, and had a blast. Lots of 10-22" walleyes & 5# northern, cabin was very nice-great drinking water. The lack of hot water was the only hardship. Very easy people to work with.
